Introduction

Wonbin is a South Korean singer under SM Entertainment and a member of the boy group RIIZE. He made his debut on September 4th, 2023, with the single album "Get A Guitar".

SM Entertainment:

Fun facts

1
Wonbin is skilled at playing the guitar and performing.
…
2
Wonbin's official emoji is (a red guitar) because he is good at playing the guitar. (from RIIZE's official Instagram)
…
3
Wonbin is afraid of extreme rides at amusement parks, and he doesn't like going to haunted houses as well.
…
4
He loves eating Korean food.
…
5
Wonbin wants to be friends with EXO's Kai because he loves dancing.
…
6
Wonbin likes eating sauced chicken from GCOVA. According to his member, Sohee, he eats it almost every day.
…
7
Wonbin used to be an athlete and was a part of a track and field team in Ulsan.
…
8
Wonbin made an earring for himself when he got his ears pierced for the first time with his name and a star symbol.
